mobs.long_desc: A grey scrawny little creature tears flesh from its prey.
mobs.desc: Small and grey-skinned, this little creature twitches even when standing motionless.  When it grins, its mouth exposes three lines full of jagged sharp teeth, ideal for tearing flesh from its prey.  It slopes over as it moves about, leaving it to nearly drag his five to six inch claws along the ground. Whatever it may be, it does appear to be hungry...

mobs.long_desc: A tree as dark as the blood of night stands firmly here.
mobs.desc: Wonderous as it is mysterious.  The tree is pitch black and stands at least twenty feet tall.  The leaves that grow off the limbs are as pure black as the heart of evil.  The beautiful silver lining trims the outer edge of the leaves, mesmerizing the eyes.  A strong sense of power emanates from the unexplainable wonder.  The tree appears to glow mildly, thriving on the darkened life.

mobs.long_desc: A grey scrawny little creature tears flesh from its prey.
mobs.desc: Small and grey-skinned, this little creature twitches even when standing motionless.  When it grins, its mouth exposes three lines full of jagged sharp teeth, ideal for tearing flesh from its prey.  It slopes over as it moves about, leaving it to nearly drag his five to six inch claws along the ground. Whatever it may be, it does appear to be hungry...

mobs.long_desc: A torrid wind rakes the ground.
mobs.desc: The lines of this creature are unknown.  As to were it stops and air beings lies within its vague silhouette.  There appears to be no body, as it unclearly outlines drift, shifting shapes faster than the heart beats.

mobs.long_desc: A windstorm rushes quickly along the sands here.
mobs.desc: Thunder and lightning erupts from this gigantic tornado.  Lightning hurls from the ungodly beast, treading it to the ground.  In only vague form and chaos of debris does this unrelenting storm appear.

mobs.long_desc: A statue of blackened glass stands here.
mobs.desc: Standing at least seven feet tall, this marvelous statue looks crafted from pure glass.  Trudging probably two feet in its stalk, it does not appear meek by any means.

mobs.long_desc: A woman holding a spellbook rests against the tree.
mobs.desc: A very tall and wise looking woman sits against the tree here. Through all her wisdom she seems somewhat lost, peering back and forth asthough for some sign that she's on the right track.

mobs.long_desc: A small man stands here peering out over the balcony.
mobs.desc: This small, almost tiny, man  stands here looking over the immediate area from this vantage point.

objects.ground: A small sign sways with the wind.

extras.text: This area is under further construction, soon to be completed.

objects.short: a pair of black ice legplates
objects.ground: A pair of dark plates rest in the shadows here.

extras.text: As if formed from solid shadow, these plates are very lightweight.  Light gleams off the surface, either pushed away or consumed inside.

objects.ground: A lightly &5&bglowing&0 staff floats just above the ground.
objects.action_desc: Glowing with a strange aura, this staff seems to be centuries old. The creator of this staff must have a been great sorcerer, for the power eminating from it would make even the greatest of mages shudder in disbelief.

extras.text: Glowing with a strange aura, this staff seems to be centuries old.  The creator of this staff must have been a great sorcerer, for the power eminating from it would make even the greatest of mages shudder in disbelief.

objects.ground: A &3&bglimm&7er&3ing&0 feather has been dropped here by someone!
objects.action_desc: This golden feather is perfectly made with the finest detail. The edges are sharp and the point is edged just enough to make it a excellent writing implement

extras.text: This golden feather is perfectly made with the finest detail.  The edges are sharp and the point is edged just enough to make it an excellent writing implement.

objects.action_desc: Long and sleek, this telescope is made completely of crystal. This cyclinder is about 15 inches long when fully extended and causes the light to refract and cast a beautiful rainbow to be projected of the ground when held at the proper angle.

extras.text: Long and sleek, this telescope is made completely of crystal.  This cylinder is about 15 inches long when fully extended and causes the light to refract and cast a beautiful rainbow to be projected on the ground when helf at the proper angle.

triggers.name: Sound damage
triggers.commands: wait 1s wdamage %actor% 10 wsend %actor% The violent rage of sounds thrust into your body, leaving you breathless. wechoaround %actor% %actor.name% reels in pain as %actor.n% gasps for air.

triggers.name: Sound damage2
triggers.commands: wait 3s wsend %actor% The violent rage of sounds thrust into your body, leaving you breathless. wechoaround %actor% %actor.name% slants over in a desperate attempt to breathe. wdamage %actor% 15

triggers.name: Exit_switch
triggers.commands: wait 1s wechoaround %actor% The winds shift violently ripping up the sands and ground, leaving the way unknown. wdoor 49219 down room 49225 wait 15s wdoor 49219 down purge

triggers.name: get_golden_quill
triggers.commands: *Inspired by ranger/druid quest if %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 8 oecho The quill begins to glow brightly! quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% elseif %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 9 oecho The quill begins to glow brightly! else wait 5 osend %actor% The quill glows so brightly it burns your hand! oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% burns %actor.p% hand on the quill! oforce %actor% drop golden-quill end if

triggers.name: load_quill_again
triggers.commands: *Make sure it doesn't load more than once if %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 8 wpurge golden-quill wload obj 49251 end if

triggers.name: quest_relocate_druid_greet
triggers.commands: *Loads staff on entry into room *note that it purges the staff first to ensure only one loads if (%actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 1) mjunk mystics wait 10 say All this way and still I am found! wait 5 scream say Fine, if you want this staff so badly, come and get it! mload obj 49250 hold staff end if

triggers.name: quest_relocate_staff_get
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 1 quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% endif if %victim.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 1 quest advance relocate_spell_quest %victim.name% endif

triggers.name: quest_relocate_greet
triggers.commands: wait 1s if !(%actor.has_completed[relocate_spell_quest]%) && %actor.level% < 100 if (%actor.class% == sorcerer || %actor.class% == cryomancer || %actor.class% == pyromancer) if (%actor.level% >= 65) switch %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% case 1 case 2 msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'Have you dealt with the thieving druid?  Please if you msend %actor% &0have, give me the staff!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage grins as she asks %actor.name% a question. break case 3 case 4 case 5 msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'Did you get the Crystal Telescope?  Please give me the msend %actor% &0Telescope!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage grins as she asks %actor.name% a question. break case 6 msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'Did you get the silver-trimmed spellbook?  Please give msend %actor% &0me the spellbook!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage grins as she asks %actor.name% a question. break case 7 msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'Do you have the map?  Please give me the map!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage grins as she asks %actor.name% a question. break case 8 case 9 msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'Do you have the Quill?  Please give me the Quill!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage grins as she asks %actor.name% a question. break default msend %actor% A scared-looking mage comes running over to you! mechoaround %actor% A scared-looking woman gets up and runs over to %actor.name%. wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'Please, can you help me?' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage pleads with %actor.name%. wait 10 cry wait 10 mechoaround %actor% A lost mage pleads with %actor.name%. msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'I'm completely lost in this dark desert, &6&bhelp&0 msend %actor% &0me get out!' done endif endif endif

triggers.name: quest_relocate_speak_help
triggers.commands: if (%actor.level% >= 65) if (%actor.class% == sorcerer || %actor.class% == cryomancer || %actor.class% == pyromancer) wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'I used to know a spell, yes, quite the spell!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'But I do not have the materials I need...' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wait 5 ponder msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Please, help me find the &6&bitems&0.' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage pleads with %actor.name%. endif endif

triggers.name: quest_relocate_speak_items
triggers.commands: wait 2 if (%actor.class% == sorcerer || %actor.class% == cryomancer || %actor.class% == pyromancer) && (%actor.class% > 64) msend %actor% A lost mage asks you, 'Yes, please get me the items I need to get out of here! msend %actor% &0Do this for me and I'll share this great spell with you.' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wink %actor.name% wait 10 mecho A lost mage begins taking inventory of the items she needs. wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'The first item I need...  A great mage once created a msend %actor% &0very powerful staff, but the druids stole it!' wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'The first item I'll need will be the Staff of the msend %actor% &0Mystics.  That druid, having angered the mage, fled as far as he could go, all msend %actor% &0the way past the Vale of Anlun.' wait 2s msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'If you need to remember your &7&b[progress]&0 you can' msend %actor% &0come back and check with me.' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Please go, go get me the staff I require!' quest start relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% endif

triggers.name: quest_relocate_druid_death
triggers.commands: mecho A slender druid screams, 'No! I had made my escape already!' mecho A slender druid chokes on some blood and dies.

triggers.name: quest_relocate_receive
triggers.commands: * * edit 3-7-2021 by Daedela: Acerites code was throwing errors because of the logic flow. * It worked when the questor did exactly as told, but deviating risked system failure. * The quest is identical, but the logic has been completely re-written to eliminate the errors. * Comments about Acerites hatred of ampersands is preserved for posterity and the previous code is logged on the Wiki. set stage %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% if %stage% == 1 if %object.vnum% == 49250 wait 1s mjunk mystics mecho A lost mage examines the Druidstaff carefully. wait 1s glare %actor.name% mecho %self.name% says, 'No no, it is of no use to me unless you destroy the druid mecho &0YOURSELF!  Try again.' wait 1s frown endif elseif %stage% == 2 if %object.vnum% == 49250 wait 2 quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Excellent, thank you! Thank you!' wait 10 hold mystics wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Ok, the next thing required is the Crystal msend %actor% &0Telescope.  An observer of the cold village holds it, but you must not harm msend %actor% &0him.  Convince him to give it to you, then bring it back to me.' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wait 20 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Go now, I must start with the staff!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. endif elseif %stage% == 4 if %object.vnum% == 49252 wait 1s mjunk telescope mecho A lost mage examines the telescope carefully. wait 1s frown %actor.name% mecho %self.name% says, 'How did you get this? There's something missing here. mecho &0You must earn this properly. Go NOW!' endif elseif %stage% == 5 if %object.vnum% == 49252 wait 2 quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Yes, yes! Thank you! wait 10 hold telescope wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Ok ok, you've done well, the next item I need is the msend %actor% &0spellbook.' wait 20 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'But not just any spellbook.  This one is held deep msend %actor% &0inside a very powerful tower.  To find the tower you must look within the msend %actor% &0destroyed land.  That is all I can say.  Go now!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. endif elseif %stage% == 6 if (%object.vnum% == 12520) quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% msave %actor% wait 2 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Perfect! Only two items left!' wait 10 rem mystics mjunk mystics hold spellbook wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'There is something I need from South Caelia.  I don't msend %actor% &0know the area well, but I know someone who does.  I once met a man that mapped msend %actor% &0everything he saw.  Please get me his map.' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wait 10 ponder wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'I think he said something about the ocean and the msend %actor% &0beach, that's all I know.' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. endif elseif %stage% == 7 if (%object.vnum% == 58608) quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% wait 2 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Almost there, one more!' wait 10 rem telescope mjunk telescope hold map wait 10 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'The only thing left that I need is something to write msend %actor% &0with.  A while back I dropped something while engaged in a little confrontation msend %actor% &0with that witch Baba.  Luckily, I don't think she saw me drop it, so it should msend %actor% &0still be hidden around there.' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wait 4s sigh wait 1s msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Please get my quill back, then I shall share the spell msend %actor% &0with you!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. m_run_room_trig 49225 endif elseif %stage% == 8 if %object.vnum% == 49251 wait 1s mecho A lost mage examines the golden quill. wait 1s sigh mecho %self.name% says, 'You did not get this yourself.  Unfortunately this is a mecho &0problem, as now that another has touched this it has lost its power.' frown endif elseif %stage% == 9 if (%object.vnum% == 49251) wait 20 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Excellent, Thank you so much, please wait while I msend %actor% &0scribe my spell!' mechoaround %actor% A lost mage tells something to %actor.name%. wait 1s sit rem map mjunk map hold quill mecho A lost mage puts on her spectacles and begins to scribe. wait 20 mecho A lost mage puts away her spectacles and stops scribing. sta fly wait 1s msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'Very well, I'm done!  Thank you so much, msend %actor% &0%actor.name%!' wait 20 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'And, as I promised, here is the spell!' msend %actor% A lost mage shows you the spell scribed in her spellbook. mskillset %actor.name% relocate quest complete relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% mechoaround %actor% A lost mage shows %actor.name% her spellbook, teaching %actor.p% her secrets. wait 20 mecho A lost mage starts casting &3&b'relocate'&0... wait 15 mecho &7&bA lost mage's molecules loosen and eventually dissipate into thin air.&0 mgoto 49299 mpurge self endif else return 0 wait 2 msend %actor% A lost mage tells you, 'This item doesn't help me.' msend %actor% A lost mage returns your item. mechoaround %actor% A lost mage returns %actor.name%'s item. endif

triggers.name: relocate_telescope_subquest
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 3 quest variable relocate_spell_quest %actor% greet 1 msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'You were sent here for my crystal instrument.  I'll be msend %actor% &0more then happy to give it to you, but...' mechoaround %actor% The observer tells something to %actor.name%. wait 5 msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'I cannot just give it away for free.' mechoaround %actor% The observer tells something to %actor.name%. wait 10 msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'I have heard of a powerful artifact that I would msend %actor% &0greatly value...  For research purposes, of course.' mechoaround %actor% The observer tells something to %actor.name%. wink %actor.name% wait 2s msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'I hear tell of a glass globe in the Valley of the msend %actor% &0Frost Elves that has the power to alter time!  Bring it to me and I will let msend %actor% &0you have my telescope.' elseif (%actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 4) msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'Do you have the globe?!  Please give it to me!' mechoaround %actor% The observer tells something to %actor.name%. bounce endif

triggers.name: telescope_subquest_receive
triggers.commands: * Check for proper actor stage and item if (%object.vnum% == 53424) if (%actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 4) wait 10 msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'Thank you so much, you have recovered the lost globe!' thank %actor.name% rem telescope msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'Here, you may now have my Crystal Telescope.' give telescope %actor.name% quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% bow %actor.name% mecho The observer leaves down. mpurge globe mpurge observer halt else wait 10 eyebrow %actor.name% msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'Yes, this is what I seek, but how did you come by it? msend %actor% &0Only the one that did retrieve the glass for me can be rewarded!' mechoaround %actor% The observer questions %actor.name% harshly. junk snow-globe endif else return 0 wait 2 msend %actor% The observer tells you, 'This isn't my globe!' msend %actor% The observer returns your item to you. mechoaround %actor% The observer refuses %obj.shortdesc% from %actor.name%. endif

triggers.name: relocate_get_sphere
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 3 quest advance relocate_spell_quest %actor.name% set echo 1 endif if %victim.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% == 3 quest advance relocate_spell_quest %victim.name% set echo 1 endif if %echo% wait 2 oecho The globe glares brightly with power! endif

triggers.name: relocate_spell_quest_status_checker
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[relocate_spell_quest]% wait 1s if %actor.has_completed[relocate_spell_quest]% say I've already taught you my greatest spell. halt endif switch %stage% case 1 case 2 set next the Staff of the Mystics set place a druid past the Vale of Anlun break case 3 set next the Crystal Telescope set place an observer of the cold village break case 4 set next a glass globe set place the Valley of the Frost Elves break case 5 set next the Crystal Telescope by returning the glass globe set place an observer of the cold village break case 6 set next a silver-trimmed spellbook set place a tower within a destroyed land break case 7 set next a map set place from a mapper in South Caelia break case 8 set next the Golden Quill set place the forest near Baba Yaga's hut break default say Please help me! done say You are trying to retrieve: mecho &2&b%next%&0 mecho &0from &7&b%place%.&0

triggers.name: nexus_cloak_pin_reload
triggers.commands: oload obj 49299 oecho The &9&bNexus &1Cloak&0 &9&bPin&0 begins to &4&bgl&6&bow&0 mysteriously then fades back to normal. oforce %actor% get pin opurge %self%

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: Wind rasps through the rough land raking along the blackened sands as it echoes within the darkened night.  Shadows paint the stretch of land as far as sight can touch.  Huge violently jagged plateaus lay scattered in faint view warping the desert plane.  Darkness shatters the hollow light that wanders blindly to its oblivion.  Nothing grows, save the ever-staggering view of pillaged land.  The west folds hope of light while the east and north sends it unto damnation.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The barren wastelands hold nothing save the abundance of emptiness.  The light forever raped of its honor and pride, as what was is no more.  The settlement of blackened dust and solid darkness are all that make home here. Eternally embedded within darkness, the forsaken land gives view of all that may have been, and all that is now.  The shade clouds the light of day, forcing the sun into night and embracing the mere essence of darkness.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The laced presence of darkness taints even the brightest of light.  For when the light touches the heavy shallow air it fades into a faint gray mist that pours into the soul, driving the mind mad.  Leaving there but thoughts and whispers of hate and pain grasping at the threads of sanity within one's self. The traces of the thinned air are filtered by the dampness emanating from the falsely soiled ground.  Further downward the path weakens from what is in sight.  The blackened day leaves forth no sight or further direction.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The laced presence of darkness taints even the brightest of light.  For when the light touches the heavy shallow air it fades into a faint gray mist that pours into the soul, driving the mind mad.  Leaving there but thoughts and whispers of hate and pain grasping at the threads of sanity within one's self. The traces of the thinned air are filtered by the dampness emanating from the falsely soiled ground.  The blackened day leaves forth no sight or further direction.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The barren wasteland holds nothing save the abundance of emptiness.  The light forever raped of its honor and pride, as what was is no more.  The settlement of blackened dust and solid darkness are all that make home here. Eternally embedded within darkness, the forsaken land gives view of all that may have been, and all that is now.  The shade clouds the light of day, forcing the sun into night and embracing the mere essence of darkness.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: Whispers haunt the dreary air, echoing off the bleak shards of blackened sand and earth.  The remaining silence is shattered as hope falls, for there is no place for hope upon the cursed blight of this plane.  A sparse mist lusts within the lungs as it soars along its weary journey, becoming unto its end. Rubble of crushed onyx stone litters the lane of sight, making travel an easier choice to deny.  Darkness seeps within the chasm of light, encasing it and holding view from the eye.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The barren wasteland holds nothing save the abundance of emptiness.  The light forever raped of its honor and pride, as what was is no more.  The settlement of blackened dust and solid darkness are all that make home here. Eternally embedded within darkness, the forsaken land gives view of all that may have been, and all that is now.  The shade clouds the light of day, forcing the sun into night and embracing the mere essence of darkness.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The barren wasteland holds nothing save the abundance of emptiness.  The light forever raped of its honor and pride, as what was is no more.  The settlement of blackened dust and solid darkness are all that make home here. Eternally embedded within darkness, the forsaken land gives view of all that may have been, and all that is now.  The shade clouds the light of day, forcing the sun into night and embracing the mere essence of darkness.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The laced presence of darkness taints even the brightest of light.  For when the light touches the heavy shallow air it fades into a faint grey mist that pours into the soul, driving the mind mad.  Leaving there but thoughts and whispers of hate and pain grasping at the threads of sanity within one's self. The traces of the thinned air are filtered by the dampness emanating from the falsely soiled ground.  Further downward the path weakens from what is insight. The blackened day leaves forth no sight or further direction.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The black sands flow into forever with its sharpened glass-like glare.  The haunting air of darkness pours from above and caresses the shaded planes. Into the air, lifts hope and dreams of purity as it is raped from the unwilling mind.  A plateau stands but footsteps away, enhancing the volatile landscape with its threatening jagged blades crafted of blackened ice.  Each blade pierces from the earth, as if the the land below were trying to escape its prison.  To the west holds the plateau, upwards host only what was before seen.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: A rough glass like shell covers the enormous plateau that dwarfs the land around it.  Rage against elements shatters through anything that presents dismay unto the untouched black sand beneath.  The mere essence of life is vacant in this shadowed plane, or at least lush life of sacred light.  A grey fog graces the weary air all around, creating no trace of sight to the surrounding whispers.  The fog blocks all sight of direction, north and south are under its grasp.  The wind rasp east, calling gently a comforting hum.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The line between darkness and light has long faded into the unknown.  The beginning of creation and end of destruction is lost, or perhaps never found. Shards of ice and sand consume the perhaps once wondrous land.  Now they merely block the surroundings, guarding without threat.  A large plateau lies south; no other paths are identified.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The dreary grasp of darkness lightens upon the air as it loses its dismal form.  The winds flow downward from above, enticing those who would seek light, or even perhaps a form of green life.  The massive thickening taste of black plague moistens the air from the north, drawing ever so near ...  Seeming to form a fist out of pure shade and solace ...  Clench the soul and bring it forward.  The north holds the ungodly presence of the unholy, upwards hosts a sense of tranquillity.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The thickened cloud of night undresses its shades ever so reluctantly.  The void of indifference within light and dark fiercely meet here, standing their ground as if two forces were to guard their own domains.  The air north does so seem to scent of life and brethren of so.  The chilling, heavy winds of below only bring stench of life's decay.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: Though unseen the scent of life furls about in the air, whispering softly into the lighthearted ear.  The weary chants of the darkening winds can barely be heard in the distance.  The sand remains its deepened black.  Sharpened blades of ice and stone still thrust outward from the ground were trees and grass would once lie.  The still darkened sky haunts the realm southward, as to the north the scent among the wind beckons a kind heart.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The potent stench of life's decay of will is nearly no more.  The eastbound wind flows freely here.  It brings the holy lush scent of life and the essence of peace.  Faint rushing of water engorges in the distance.  Silence is no more, nor are the howling chants that tear at the soul.  A feeling of tranquillity flows like a river, drawing the senses of the kind hearted west. The south leaves little for life's claim.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The air simmers with the fresh scent of life's essence.  Bound with pedals of flowers, and the even glorious smell of earth.  The black sand still attributes this wasteland but seems abrupt in its path upwards the modest hillside.  The gentle whisk of a soft breeze whisp past the leaves or bristles of trees in the faint distance are of a sweet calling to the loving mind. Northward would seem to have begotten unto darkness from lights fall, as the thickened scent of decay still stands vigilant in its direction.  Towards above there appears to be some sort of tree line, or at least vegetation.

Up.description: The view is faint but ever captivating for such who would love life.  The calling of lush green life beckons this way.

rooms.name: Forest of Awakening
rooms.description: The clearing in the sand is enough alone for those who seek refuge among life.  Though the sky is still dark, life seems in abundance.  As grass grows all around, a forest of trees move northward.  A small path moves towards the north, it appears it winds around a small pond in the distance.  The beautiful land seems to grow lusher the further away from the darkened sands, perhaps even the sky shall clear.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The terrifying view of decadence resides happily here, fading from its previous south successor.  Dust fills the air, twisting and winding like a whirlpool without depth of the water.  A skeleton of a rather large size rests calmly to the right of the path downward.  Blood of some form lies along the sand, seeming to become larger in pools the further down it is.  The view north is withheld due to the violent sand blazing around and around unconfined.

extras.text: Ordinary enough to see blood, perhaps from pray.  Alas not much life is seen within a wasteland.  The blood is rich red, and taints the sand as it grows large in small puddles downward.  It looks to be a recent kill.

Few of the bones are still intact, one of the femurs has been completely shattered though.  Some of the rib cage has been buried under the sand.  The structure is to large to be of human origin.  Perhaps it may have been an orge, or a large barbarian.  Be it whatever the case, some strong must brought it down.

rooms.name: Black Ice Desert
rooms.description: The light is burned in darkness before it ever reaches the air here.  Winds scream, howling as banshees in the cold shallow night.  Fierce twisters of thrashing wind blur sand and dust through, pelting all within reach.  Because of the light's absence, darkness cloaks the living night with its embrace. Nothing to remain, nowhere to turn, all within lost.

rooms.name: Faded Trail
rooms.description: The constant churning of rough wind upon the flesh grasps like cold, blazed steel through the chest.  The darkness lurches dimmer as grey is consumed by night.  A few small puddles of blood are left stretching eastward.  Upward, remnants of a skeleton appear to rest; the owner seems to have lost them.

extras.text: Four small puddles of blood stand without doubt of certainty.  They appear to be but an inch or so deep.  The blood must be fresh, because of its richness of color and smell.

rooms.name: Faded Trail
rooms.description: Time begins to fade or at least has lost its place here.  The need for light has long passed this desolate land, as it has become obviously accustomed to the frigid wind and eternity without light.  The scent of blood is thick and well founded, as it modestly coats the ice and sand with its stain.  The streaks of blood lead downward, only small puddles appear west.

extras.text: About three deeply red lines streak downward, painting the ground beneath. Leaving much to the imagination as the its path or the owners demise.

rooms.name: Faded Trail
rooms.description: The putrid smell of a fresh kill draws ever nearer as it is carried within the grasp of the howling winds that echo across the plane.  Solace and enlightenment are not even in faint traces, as hope and tranquil harmony have not even opportunity for lost.  Guided upon these shallow winds, nothing can be lost if it does not exist.  To the east the blood runs thicker and wider along the desolate sands.  The view up is covered in a small dim of vacant light.

extras.text: The same as before, rich dark red, just ozing from its owner.  Wherever they may be.  The blood runs eastward, getting larger in amounts the further it trails on.

rooms.name: Faded Trail
rooms.description: The sky is ablaze with the spark of rage, settled within a silent cell of confinement.  The land itself appears to shake with tremendous power, only to feel it dwindle down time again.  Streaks of light flash by, barely missing the fame of the eye as it runs into oblivion.  The path of blood continues running north.  The west sends the chilling winds hurling back through the wicked land.

extras.text: The blood of innocent or damned?  Nonetheless, the pain or satisfaction of such a site remains forward north.

rooms.name: Faded Trail
rooms.description: The definition of darkness needs no define as that is all that exist within this plane of emptiness.  The faded path splits in all directions, leading the worn way into nothingness or perhaps only the unseen.  Mind-quaking voices pour into the serene, desecrating the kind and hopeful heart.  Here the shallow world around alone could drive the soul mad.  The voices seem to echo out of the west.  The long streaks of blood journey forward north.  As for the east, it bellows downward thrusting along a worn path.  To the south would seem the only sane way out.

rooms.name: Under the Grace Tree
rooms.description: Wisps of light blur and fade, crossing from the seen into the unknown. Whispers flow like water pouring over a hillside as they rush past the ear, straight for the mind.  A large darkened tree stands in solitude as with no peers to accompany its dark gracefulness.  The ground around it flows upwards unto the base, as if it were bowing with respect or even fear.  Wind soars, surrounding the area but just flows around it, ripping away at the land but doesn't touch the tree.  The east seems to be the only way to venture forth.

rooms.name: Faded Trail
rooms.description: Startling fragments of light scream silently into the unknown, leaving wondrous streaks of fading dust.  The presence of the shards of light soaring through out the sky unveils the violent winds carrying the dust over the darkened plane.  Though presence of one brings forth absence of another as no sane or natural life takes home to the vast wasteland.  The cliff line here ventures slightly northward over the edge, and appears also to journey a bit southeast.

rooms.name: Faded Trail
rooms.description: The faint wisps of light lumber toward the earth into the flooding sounds of rushing water.  A soft yet faint scent mills within the air, undeniably familiar yet vaguely unknown.  The coarse lands of the plateau thrust downwards towards the sounds of a river or violent lake.  To the west simple dark voices shatter the silence of the mind.  Down the plateau is the only other exit.

rooms.name: Down the Plateau
rooms.description: The faded remains of a perhaps once beautiful land aspire only to the pain and eternal rage of betrayal and vengeance.  Upon the values of light, the cloaking darkness swallows the beating essence of it whole.  The sounds of rushing water violently crashing obviously stem downwards.  Upward is the only other way.

rooms.name: Further Down the Plateau
rooms.description: The faded remains of a perhaps once beautiful land aspire only to the pain and eternal rage of betrayal and vengeance.  Upon the values of light, the cloaking darkness swallows the beating essence of it whole.  The sounds of rushing water violently crashing obviously stem downwards.  Upward is the only other way.

rooms.name: Bottom on the Plateau
rooms.description: The plateau ceases its run here, leaving a tremendous view of the land ahead and below.  Spine crushing sounds rush forth out of the depths north into body, leaving it breathless.  The vague sour smell flows from the north, consuming all within its path.  The land all around is coated in sharpened blades of ice thrusting out of the land, save the north and east.

rooms.name: The Banks of Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: The thunderous ravages of water rapids scream horridly out of the depths below.  The sudden rush of silence is shattered only in pauses of the mind, as it fails to comprehend.  The bank offers a wholesome view of a large lake, yet the absence of water leaves little to the imagination as to what causes the sounds embrace.  The depth of the empty lakebed is enormous, stretching further than the eye can see.  Reaching into the unknown the west follows a simple path into the bottom.

rooms.name: Bottom of Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: Led downward and into an abyss of broken shards of land, the sounds echo though out the savaged plane.  The crevice is deep, tearing at least seventy feet into the ground, leaving acres of expose land that was once covered.  The area all around is littered with massive plateaus and hair splitting blades of ice, blocking most directions.  Though the eerie sounds of waves crashing violently, and the tide throwing itself into the debts below still stay behind, no water remains.  Only the mere dried flakes of red crumbs glaze the land in a simple coat.  The only leaves are eastward up the bank, or west further into the lakebed.

rooms.name: Bottom of Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: Dark and ruthless, the winds rip through the land below crushing life within its path.  Two small holes appear dug into the plateaus, one on the right and left.  Fragments of bone and bits of flesh litter the lakebed, mostly around the strange pits.  A faint whisper flies through the sounds of crashing water and taints the ear with unknown words.  The one ways to move are north and east, the darkness blocking their path.

extras.text: Becomming of the unknown, there is no possible way to see what the slivers of bone could have came from.  The pieces of flesh are few and very small, all are greenish brown and appear to be decomposing.  Most of the flesh and bones trail around the mysterious holes in the plateaus.
No larger then two feet wide, they rest at the base of the mounds, moving downward.  They appear to be deep, but there is not a way any normal size gnome could even fit down there.

rooms.name: Over Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: The magnificence of lightning can bee seen in the distance as it scorches the ground.  An absence of light from below hides the ground from view.  The only escapes are to the south or downward into the depths below.

rooms.name: Over Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: Darkness still holds the fate below from view.

rooms.name: Over Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: Darkness still holds the fate below from view.

rooms.name: Over Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: Darkness still holds the fate below from view.

rooms.name: Bottom of Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: The finishings of the damned and cracked lakebed is quite remarkable, in the sense the chaos and destruction satisfies the soul.  The wind leaves a bleak outlook upon the dunes and plateaus, tracing back and forth raking over this desolate land.  Holes litter the ground, hosting the unexplainable or unknown. From which one of the lighthearted may wish to remain so.  Darkness retracts the greatest length of view, forcing one to move closer for clarity.  The south is the only direction viewable, though the east and west appear as paths as well.

rooms.name: Bottom of Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: The strafe sands bleach pure ground into a massive wasteland of chaos and destruction.  The waters that must have filled these enormous cliffs are now a faded memory transpired into the unseen.  The simplicity of life is not even of a token, as life here has forgotten its way, or damned to return upon the winged back of light.  The shaded plateaus and sharded sands make any further movement unreachable, save to the east.

rooms.name: Bottom of Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: The sand and frozen ground is soft here, showing moisture has a dire presence.  Majestic peaks of frozen sand and black ice harbor the surroundings, making movement little too impossible.  Upward the cliff line runs astray, making a path towards the never-ending vast land.  The west is the only way out of this pitfall.

rooms.name: Raze of Lake Neiavah
rooms.description: Creeping up from the bed like a mountain of sand, the raze is smoothly polished with a wicked glaze of blackened ice.  From here, just twenty to thirty feet up from the lakebed, holds a miraculous view of the depths below. The rabid winds screech by tugging at the body as if it wishes to take the soul along with it.  The only ways unveiled are further up the raze or downward seeping into the lakebed.

rooms.name: Under the Plateau
rooms.description: A wonderous cavern unfolds, surrouding the eyes with natural or unnatural beauty.  The walls glisten as they reflect a single shard of light, that perhaps has been trapped here for a long time.  The small cavern only appears to be around ten feet high and about the same in width.  Being at least that deep into the ground, the ice appears unscathed or without scratch.  The only way out looks to be the way in.

rooms.name: Top of the Raze
rooms.description: At the height of its horror the desolate plains still holds an element of perfection within its design.  A terrifyingly beauteous view beholds the eyes upon glancing at this wasteland.  An ironic peaceful feeling soothes the soul, gently calling for it to stay.  The desert continues towards the east.  The raze journeys downwards towards the lakebed.

rooms.name: A Turn of Shades
rooms.description: The darkness rises and light treads silently inward toward its ultimate fate.  The light faintly caresses the night, leaving different shades of grey before departing into the unseen.  The vivid view lain here bestows no virtue or honor, only an unquenchable emptiness for the innermost desires.  Shards of ice are scattered to the sides delivering a pathway heading eastward.  The raze of Lake Neiavah lies to the west.

rooms.name: Holding room for relocate quest
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.
